targets.query:
from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lmwx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MwxPortRelWindDir")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lmwx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MwxStbdRelWindDir")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lmwx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MwxPortRelWindSpeed" or r._field == "MwxStbdRelWindSpeed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "true_wind")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "PortTrueWindDir")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "true_wind")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "StbdTrueWindDir")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "true_wind")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "PortTrueWindSpeed" or r._field == "StbdTrueWindSpeed")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lmwx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MwxBarometer")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lmwx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MwxAirTemp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lmwx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MwxAirRelHumid")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "openrvdas")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lmwx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MwxPAR" or 
            r._field == "MwxPIRThermo" or r._field == "MwxPSP")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
